TopicTitle: How Close are YOU to Your Next Reputation Rank?

Articles.Content:
Currently, I'm at 98 for reputation points. I will get 2 bars when I reach 100, so it's a big accomplishment! (For me ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif))

What about you all? How close are you to your next green bar?
I need two more rep points to get 4 bars I think.
I am 78 rep away from my fifth bar. Geez, you guys love me. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
Just about thirty more rep points before getting my second bar..
At what number do you rank up?

I didn't care until you mentioned it so I dug around and found the details: I seem to be sitting pretty at 25.

And my Not-Caring kicks in again... :I

I'm assuming that it goes 1st bar at 1 rep, second at 100, third at 200, fourth at 300, fifth at 400, and first light green at 500. I could be completely wrong though.

If it is second bar at 100, I'm only 12 rep away from getting it. So that's cool.
I have to get 69 more rep to get a fourth bar (nobody laugh at that)
I'm at 102, so I guess I'm a long ways away.
Ok, I do not understand what the milestone rep works. How much rep does one need to reach each "rank"?
100 rep per bar. After 500 rep, it is 200 rep per greenlight bar.
24 points from my 3rd light green bar
I just now noticed that I have 6 bars of rep!

> 
> I just now noticed that I have 6 bars of rep!

\*cough\* Eleven \*cough\*

I've got 43 points left to the next level of 900 points. (I'm at 857)
Im 22 points away from two bars
I am just waiting for Red Iron Crown to post here.... \*Frowns\*

> 
> I am just waiting for Red Iron Crown to post here.... \*Frowns\*

I'm the closest you're going to get, at least for now. ![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif)

Because I have six light-green bars of Reputation (eleven total), I will never get another light-green pip. Which is actually kinda sad, when you think about it. The next major milestone to overcome is getting 2,000 points of Reputation, though I doubt I'll be there anytime soon.

Oh, and while I'm here, I should probably point people to the ["Say Hello to the Light-Green Group!"](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/95623-Say-Hello-to-the-Light-Green-Group%21) thread which I made, though I'm sure you've seen it already. ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

-Upsilon
This is totally not a rep fishing thread. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> This is totally not a rep fishing thread. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Totally not one. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> This is totally not a rep fishing thread. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

What? I was just asking a question! ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Quite far, but I don't worry about it. One interesting paradox I've noted is that a place you'd expect to get lots of rep, answering Gameplay Questions, is actually very spare--I suppose because if someone is n00b enough to need help getting to Minmus, he is also too n00b to know how to give rep. I try to pass out as much as I can myself, if for no other reason so that I never get blocked for giving +2 to an excellent and deserving poster.
Seven.
31 rep away from four bars. One day I will ascend to The Light-Green Group and enslave them all!
20! Rainbow trout OMG you deserve like... Seven bars. You're awesome!

> 
> 31 rep away from four bars. One day I will ascend to The Light-Green Group and enslave them all!

Uhm, did you get momentarily possessed by the spirit of Green Iron Crown?
